Changelog:

Closed beta patch 2:

  • fixed a crash when you clicked in an invalid place in build mode
  • inverted click instruction in the tutorial for building a torch
  • fixed a crash that would happen when returning to a save where shroomies were off foraging
  • fixed portraits not updating when shroomie is asleep or hard at work

Closed beta patch 1:

  • inverted left-click and right-click in build modes
  • made shroomies a little less needy
  • shroomies no longer talk in their sleep
  • reduced pitch on shroomie sfx while time is sped up
  • removed test functionality on tab
  • fixed a crash that could happen when queueing build tasks
